What a great end to a fantastic first event.
We have had 100 odd students here, we have

1575.text:
had some fantastic scores, great weather and
hopefully it will be back in the calendar

1581.text:
for next year and for the next event which
is the Schools Challenge on the 6th May and

1588.text:
the Bredon Festival of Shooting, do come along
and join us.

1592.text:
If you would like to take part in either the
University Challenge or the Schools Challenge

1597.text:
events, which take place throughout the year,
go to www.theschoolschallenge.co.uk

bringing you the opening of the seasons for

somewhere in the sky above my head or visit
